        self.B16_2.setTabletTracking(False)
        self.B16_2.setAcceptDrops(False)
        self.B16_2.setStyleSheet("font: 12pt \"Times New Roman\";")
        self.B16_2.setCheckable(True)
        self.B16_2.setChecked(True)
        self.B16_2.setObjectName("B16_2")
        self.horizontalLayout_11.addWidget(self.B16_2)
        self.B15_2 = QtWidgets.QRadioButton(self.layoutWidget_2)
        self.B15_2.setStyleSheet("font: 12pt \"Times New Roman\";")
        self.B15_2.setObjectName("B15_2")
        self.horizontalLayout_11.addWidget(self.B15_2)
        MainWindow.setCentralWidget(self.centralwidget)
        self.menubar = QtWidgets.QMenuBar(MainWindow)
        self.menubar.setGeometry(QtCore.QRect(0, 0, 1090, 26))
        self.menubar.setObjectName("menubar")
        MainWindow.setMenuBar(self.menubar)

        # 按钮槽函数绑定

        self.pushButton.clicked.connect(self.convert)


        self.retranslateUi(MainWindow)
        QtCore.QMetaObject.connectSlotsByName(MainWindow)

    def convert(self):
        # 回归模型
        model = joblib.load(filename='model-r')
        # 分类模型
        model2 = joblib.load(filename="model-c")

        df = pd.DataFrame([0 for i in range(12)]).T

        if self.B15_2.isChecked():
            i0=0
        elif self.B16_2.isChecked():
            i0=1

        df[0] = i0

        df[1] = float(self.l2.text())
        df[2] = float(self.l3.text())
        df[3] = float(self.l4.text())
        df[4] = float(self.l5.text())
        df[5] = float(self.l1.text())
        df[6] = float(self.l6.text())

        if self.B21.isChecked():
            i6 = 0
        elif self.B22.isChecked():
            i6 = 1
        elif self.B23.isChecked():
            i6 = 2

        df[7] = i6

        if self.B11.isChecked():
            i7 = 0
        elif self.B12.isChecked():
            i7 = 1
        elif self.B13.isChecked():
            i7 = 2
        elif self.B14.isChecked():
            i7 = 3
        elif self.B15.isChecked():
            i7 = 4

        df[8] = i7


        df[9] = float(self.l7.text())

        df[10] = float(self.l9.text())
        df[11] = float(self.l8.text())

        df.columns = ['TGS','D/T','fc','d','Ld','t/d','fu','LT','TCD','N','Q','B']


        result1 = model.predict(df)
        result1 = str(result1)
        result1 = result1.replace('[', '')
        result1 = result1.replace(']', '')
        print(result1)

        result2 = model2.predict(df)
        result2 = int(result2)
        if result2 == 0:
            result2 = 'Rebar pull-out failure'
        else:
            result2 = 'Rebar fracture failure'

        self.out_f.setText(result2)
        self.out_t.setText(result1)

    def retranslateUi(self, MainWindow):
        _translate = QtCore.QCoreApplication.translate
        MainWindow.setWindowTitle(_translate("MainWindow", "MainWindow"))
        self.label.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Ratio of grouting material thickness to rebar diameter"))
        self.label_2.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Ratio of sleeve outer diameter to wall thickness"))
        self.label_3.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Compressive strength of the grout (MPa)"))
        self.label_4.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Rebar diameter (mm)"))
        self.label_5.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Anchorage length of the rebar (mm)"))
        self.label_6.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Ultimate tensile strength of the rebar (MPa)"))
        self.label_7.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Number of defects"))
        self.label_8.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Bond defect ratio between the rebar and grouting materials"))
        self.label_9.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Quality loss ratio of grouting materials"))
        self.pushButton.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "START"))
        self.B15.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Longitudinal defects"))
        self.B14.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Uniform defects"))
        self.B13.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Median defects"))
        self.B11.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "No defects"))
        self.B12.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "End defects"))
        self.B23.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Cyclic loading at large strain"))
        self.B22.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Cyclic loading at high stress"))
        self.B21.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Uniaxial loading "))
        self.label_12.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Tensile load capacity (kN)"))
        self.label_13.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "          Failure modes         "))
        self.B16_2.setText(_translate("MainWindow", " Full-splice sleeve connection"))
        self.B15_2.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Half-splice sleeve connection"))


if __name__ == "__main__":
    import sys
    app = QtWidgets.QApplication(sys.argv)
    MainWindow = QtWidgets.QMainWindow()
    ui = Ui_MainWindow()
    ui.setupUi(MainWindow)

    MainWindow.show()
    sys.exit(app.exec_())
